Fatoumata, qui est âgé de 30 ans, vit dans une famille composée de 4 personnes dont 2 enfants. L’agriculture lui permet d'assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire pour toute sa famille .  Fatoumata a acheté un paquet d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide. A travers cet achat, Fatoumata espère pouvoir voir plus de pluviométrie et semence de qualité afin de pouvoir grandir le commerce et rendement.
texts.en: Fatoumata is in the second row on the far left in the photo wearing a pink t-shirt and holding a myAgro pouch. She is a member of a group of 11 farmers who work and live in Diago village southeast of Bamako in Mali. Fatoumata, who is 30 years old, lives in a family of 4, with 2 children. Fatoumata, who is 30 years old, purchased a packet of fertilizer to grow peanuts. With this purchase, Fatoumata hopes to be able to see more rain and high-quality seeds in order to grow her sales and yields.

loans.use: to buy a package of fertilizer to cultivate peanuts

loans.name: Germaine's Group

texts.fr: Germaine,  assise au centre avec l’enfant en rose  sur la photo, est membre d'un groupe de 7 producteurs agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Sougoula, au sud-est de Bamako, au Mali. Moussoni, qui est âgée de 59 ans, vit dans une famille composée de 40 personnes dont 25  enfants. L’agriculture lui permet d’assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire pour toute sa famille et d’être indépendante. Elle a décidé de se réinscrire à myAgro pour avoir de bonnes semences  et de bons rendements. Ce que myAgro a changé dans son travail, c’est l’introduction de nouvelles techniques culturales un peu difficiles surtout le système de semis. Pour sa troisième  année avec myAgro, Germaine a acheté un paquet de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture de maïs  pour son champ de 0.125 hectares. A travers cet achat, Germaine espère pouvoir augmenter ses rendements, devenir un bon membre de myAgro et assurer l’autosuffisance alimentaire dans la famille. Enfin, Germaine souhaiterait qu’il y ait de la cohésion  et  la joie chez elle et dans tout le village.
texts.en: Germaine, who is seated in the center with the child wearing pink on her lap in the photo, is a member of a group of 7 farmers who lie in the Sougoula village southeast of Bamako in Mali. Moussoni, who is 50 years old, lives in a family with 40 members, 25 of whom are children. Farming allows her to see to her family's food needs for the whole family, and to be independent. She decided to sign up with myAgro for another year in order to access good seeds and have god yields. myAgro changed her farming practices by introducing some complicated new techniques for growing, especially the planting system. For her third year, Germaine purchased a package of seed and fertilizer to grow corn on her .125 hectare holding. With this purchase, Germaine hopes to increase her yields, become a good member of myAgro and see to her family's food independence. In the end, Germaine would like to see cohesion and joy in her home, and in the whole village.

loans.use: To buy a package of certified seed and fertilizer to grow corn

loans.name: Moussoni's Group

texts.fr: Moussoni,  assise juste devant et portant un foulard vert clair sur la photo, est membre d'un groupe de 8 productrices agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Sido, au sud-est de Bamako, au Mali. Moussoni, qui est âgée de 46 ans, vit dans une famille composée de 50 personnes dont 16  enfants. L’agriculture lui permet d’assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire pour toute sa famille. Elle a décidé de se réinscrire à myAgro pour avoir de bonnes semences  et de bons rendements. Ce que myAgro a changé dans son travail, c’est l’introduction de nouvelles techniques culturales. Pour sa quatrième  année avec myAgro, Moussoni a acheté un paquet de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide pour son champ de 0.25 hectares. A travers cet achat, Moussoni espère pouvoir augmenter ses rendements  afin de pouvoir construire sa maison avec tôle  et assurer l’autosuffisance alimentaire dans la famille, ce qui garantit la paix, ajoute-t-elle.
texts.en:
Moussoni,  assise juste devant et portant un foulard vert clair sur la photo, est membre d'un groupe de 8 productrices agricoles qui travaillent et vivent dans le village de Sido, au sud-est de Bamako, au Mali. Moussoni, qui est âgée de 46 ans, vit dans une famille composée de 50 personnes dont 16  enfants. L’agriculture lui permet d’assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire pour toute sa famille. Elle a décidé de se réinscrire à myAgro pour avoir de bonnes semences  et de bons rendements. Ce que myAgro a changé dans son travail, c’est l’introduction de nouvelles techniques culturales. Pour sa quatrième  année avec myAgro, Moussoni a acheté un paquet de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide pour son champ de 0.25 hectares. A travers cet achat, Moussoni espère pouvoir augmenter ses rendements  afin de pouvoir construire sa maison avec tôle  et assurer l’autosuffisance alimentaire dans la famille, ce qui garantit la paix, ajoute-t-elle.

Moussoni is seated in the very front in a light green headscarf in the photo, and is a member of a group of 8 female farmers who work and live in Sido village southeast of Bamako in Mali. Moussoni, who is 46 years old, lives in a family composed of 50 people, 16 of whom are children. Farming allows her to provide for her family's food needs. She decided to sign up for a second year with myAgro in order to access quality seeds and have a good yield. myAgro changed her work by introducing new agricultural techniques. For her fourth year with myAgro, Moussoni purchased a packet of certified seed and fertilizer to grow peanuts on her .25 hectare field. With this purchase she hopes to increase her yield and be able to build her house with aluminum, and provide for her family's food needs, because she says this keeps things peaceful.

loans.use: to buy a packet of certified seed and fertilizer to grow peanuts

loans.name: Alok Group

texts.en:
Lalita, age 25, is the leader of Alok group and hails from BCCPada, Bhawanipatna district, Odisha, India. She lives with her husband and has three children: two sons and only one daughter. The concerned member standing in front of all the group members wearing a blue colored sari with a raised hand is Lalita. 

Lalita has a house in her village, which she uses for domestic as well as business (tailor occupation) purposes with the active support of her husband. 
Lalita, along with another nine self-dependent members of her village, formed a group and took a loan from Mahashakti Foundation for the development of their existing businesses and better livelihood. The concerned members are under the poverty line but they didn’t sacrifice their lives; instead they raised their heads towards their family and community growth. 

At present, Lalita's monthly income is Rs 8,600 but it is not sufficient to meet the daily requirements of the family. Out of the small income, she is maintaining the family in a very pitiable condition. But now she is very much confident in her tailoring occupation and has acquainted herself with the market situation to fight the different challenges of society. 

She already has taken a loan from Mahashakti Foundation and wishes to purchase one more tailoring machine and other related goods in huge quantities from the nearest market. Both she and her husband will mutually develop their business and meet their social needs.

The other nine members of her group are well planned to establish their businesses like a grocery shop, vegetable cultivation, milk business, wood business, mixture shop, chicken stall, rice trading, tailoring and laundry.

loans.use: to purchase one more tailoring machine

loans.name: Francina

texts.pt:
A cliente é casada maritalmente e mãe de 4 filho, com idades compreendidas entre os 7 e 20 anos  três dos quais em idade escolar e a mais velha esta no lar. Esta cliente pensionista e é com base da pensão que sustenta sua família e paga o crédito. Com o valor financiado a cliente pretende comprar material de construção nomeadamente: 15 sacos de cimento, 8 ferros, 8 tubos com a respectiva bomba para a abertura de um furo. No momento seu maior desafio é ter sua casa concluída e também terminar a obra da sua barraca que vai ajudar no sustento da sua familia
É  cliente da instituição a sensivelmente 3 anos e já levantou 4 creditos.
texts.en: Francina is a married mother to 4 children, aged between 7 and 20 years old and, of whom, 3 are at school and the eldest is at home. She receives a pension which she uses to sustain her family and pay off her loans as she has been a microfinance institute customer for 3 years and has had 4 previous loans. She plans to use this loan to buy building materials, in particular, 15 sacks of cement, 8 building rods and 8 pipes with the respective pumps to go at the entrance of the holes. Currently, the greatest challenge that she faces is finishing the building work on her house and also finishing the work on her stall which will help to sustain her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy building materials, namely 15 sacks of cement, 8 building rods and 8 pipes with the respective pumps to go at the entrance of the holes.

loans.name: Maruti Group

texts.en:
Maruti Self Help Group (SHG) was formed in February 2015 and consists of 11 rural poor women members who belong to the Below Poverty Line category. This group is located in a remote rural village named Farsara in the Nuapada district of Odisha, India. Vegetable cultivation and vending are  the primary sources of livelihood of most of the members of this group. 

Gayatri is one of the members of this group. The lady standing with a raised hand in the photograph is Gayatri. She is a very active lady who is 26 years of age. She lives with her husband, one son and one daughter. 

Gayatri has a vegetable cultivation farm of one hectare. She and her husband manage the farm. They produce vegetables like brinjal, cauliflower, carrots, cabbage, chilies, cucumbers, papaya, ladies fingers, onions, etc. on the farm. She sells her products to the traders in the nearest town who come to take vegetables from her farm. Gayatri says that she earns a minimum amount of 3,000 INR per month from this business, which is insufficient to meet the day-to-day expenses of her family as well as the farm expenses. 

Gayatri wants to expand her business by taking a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. She will use the present loan to buy fertilizer and farm inputs like seeds and pesticides for her farm. She expects a good return from her business by expanding her cultivation. Gayatri dreams of constructing a house and purchasing a water pump for better irrigation for her farm. She also hopes to give her whole family a bright future through her hard work. Among the other members, eight are doing vegetable cultivation and selling and two members have general stores.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and farm inputs like seeds and pesticides for her farm.

loans.name: Marta

texts.pt:
Sra. Marta é mãe de 4 filhos duas Sras. e dois Homens todos já maiores de idades, ela é casada maritalmente, residente da Ponta de Ouro já a bastante tempo. Cliente da Hluvuku-Adsema pela sétima vez, os créditos que foram financiados inicialmente teriam sido para compra de electrodomésticos (dois congeladores, uma aparelhagem sonora e reforçar o negócio), com o presente financiamento pretende comprar 10 cabeças de vaca e 10 caixas de dobrada para revenda.
Tem como sonho ver seu estabelecimento crescer e adquirir mais bens que poderá usa-los no seu estabelecimento comercial. O seu maior desafio e fortalecer o seu negócio que e sua base de sustentabilidade.
texts.en:
Marta is married and has lived in Ponta de Ouro for quite a while. She has 4 children, 2 men and 2 women, who are all fully grown and this will be her seventh loan with Hluvuku-Adsema. Previously, she has used her loans to buy domestic appliances (2 freezers and a stereo system) and to restock her business. She plans to use this loan to buy 10 cows' heads and 10 boxes of tripe to resell.
She dreams of seeing her business grow and acquiring more goods which she can use within her shop, ad the greatest challenge that she faces is strengthening her business as it is her main source of family income.

loans.use: to buy 10 cows' heads and 10 boxes of tripe to resell.

loans.name: Joao

texts.pt: O senhor João é casado maritalmente pai de 2 filhos do sexo masculino e feminino com idades compreendidas entre os 10 meses e 5 anos e pra além dos filhos tem na sua responsabilidade uma irmã de 23 anos de idade que esta cursar Direito na UEM.  O cliente é trabalhador num parque como segurança, é cliente da instituição a 4 anos e com o crédito financiado o cliente pretende comprar material de construção nomeadamente: 2 portas, 4 janela e 10 sacos de cimento pra concluir sua obra. A nível profissional o cliente sonha em mudar de profissão de segurança pra recepcionista e do momento esta a tirar um curso de informática. Seu maior desafio é concluir sua obra e depois tirar uma carta de condução ligeiro pesado.
texts.en: João is a married father to 2 children - one boy and one girl, aged 10 months and 5 years - and as well as his children, he is also supporting his sister who is studying Law at the Eduardo Mondlane University, Maputo. He works as a security guard in a park and has been a microfinance customer for the last 4 years. He plans to use this loan to buy building materials, namely 2 doors, 4 windows and 10 sacks of cement so that he can finish the work on his home. In terms of his career, he dreams of leaving behind his current job and becoming a receptionist and, to this end, he is currently undertaking a course in IT. The greatest challenge that he faces is finishing the work on his home and then obtaining a driver's license for heavy and light vehicles.

loans.use: to buy building materials, namely 2 doors, 4 windows and 10 sacks of cement to finish off the building work on his home.

loans.name: Osvaldo

texts.pt:
Sr. Osvaldo é casado maritalmente sem nenhum filho ainda, conheceu a Hluvuku-Adsema a partir da sua tia cliente desta instituição e que lhe mandava efectuar seus pagamentos. É cliente da Hluvuku-Adsema pela segunda vez, com o valor financiado pretende comprar 12 chapas de zinco, 20 estacas, 5 sacos de cimento, uma porta e 40 molhos de caniço. 
Ele tem como sonho fazer o curso de contabilidade para que possa progredir no seu emprego como contabilista, tem como desafio fazer crescer seu pequeno negócio que tem na sua casa.
texts.en: Osvaldo is married and does not have any children as yet. He heard about Hluvuku-Adsema through his aunt, who is a microfinance customer, and who had sent him to make a payment on her loan. This will be his second loan with the institute and he plans to use the money to buy 12 zinc sheets, 20 stakes, 5 sacks of cement, a door and 40 reed bundles. He dreams of undertaking an accountancy course so that he can progress in his accountancy job, and the greatest challenge that he faces is growing the little business that he runs from his home.

loans.use: to buy 12 zinc sheets, 20 stakes, 5 sacks of cement, a door and 40 reed bundles.

loans.name: Belarmino

texts.pt:
Senhor Belarmino tem 27 anos de idade, casado e pai de um filho sem idade escolar, é negociante e estudante, vive em casa própria, não sustenta mais ninguém.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de sanitas, interruptores, e outros materiais diversos para revender em sua ferragem.
N o futuro pretende abrir um armazém grande para revender os produtos a grosso, de modo a ajudar os revendedores da zona que percorrem longas distâncias para adquirirem o material.
O seu maior desafio é de terminar o curso de aduaneiro que esta fazendo, e abrir um escritório próprio, de modo a adquirir mais fundos para o sustento das suas despesas.
texts.en: Belarmino is a 27 year old married father to one little boy who is of pre-school age. He is a businessman and a student who lives in his own home and is not supporting anyone else. He plans to use this loan to buy toilets, switches and a wide range of other materials to resell in his hardware shop. In the future, he hopes to open a big warehouse to sell his products wholesale as this will help the area's resellers who have to travel long distances to acquire the materials that they need. The greatest challenge that he faces is finishing the customs' course that he is currently undertaking and opening his own customs' office so that he can increase the income that he earns for his family's living expenses.

loans.use: to buy toilets, switches and a wide range of other materials to sell in his hardware shop.

loans.name: Nurzat

texts.ru: Нурзат, 30 лет, замужем, есть 2 детей, сын- школьник, дочь учится в детском саду. У Нурзат высшее образование, с 2014 года занимается торговлей одеждой, продает женские, мужские и детские куртки, джемпера, обувь. В обороте есть товар на сумму более 200,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячная прибыль Нурзат составляет 30,000 сом (KGS), в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк "Бай Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одежды для расширения товарооборота и ассортимента в магазине. Доходы от бизнеса помогут улучшить благосостояние Нурзат, а также накопить средства на покупку собственного контейнера.
texts.en:
Nurzat is 30 years old, married, and has 2 children. Her son is a schoolboy, and her daughter is attending kindergarten. Nurzat has a higher education. From 2014, she has been working in the sale of clothes, selling jackets, jumpers, and shoes for women, men and children. There are goods worth over 200,000 Som (KGS) in circulation. 

Nurzat's monthly profit is 30,000 Som (KGS), and in order to further develop her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank to ask for a loan of 150,000 Som (KGS). This will allow her to buy clothes to expand her trade and the range of goods in her shop. The business revenue will help to improve Nurzat's well-being, and also will help her to save funds in order to buy her own cargo container.

loans.use: to buy clothes for retail sales.

loans.name: Anarkan

texts.ru: Анаркан успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Анаркан на сегодня есть 6 коров, 6 телят, 20 овец, 2 лошади. На 2,0 Га она выращивает картофель, кукурузу и клевер. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет 25,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), целью которого является покупка телят. Доходы от кредита Анаркан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, она мечтает построить дом с сараями и садом для всей своей семьи.
texts.en:
Anarkan has successfully repaid her previous loan, after having used it as required. She is thankful to Kiva, as well as everyone who has helped to finance her loan. Today, Anarkan has six cows, six calves, twenty sheep, and two horses on her farm. She cultivates potatoes, maize, and clover on 2.0 hectares of land. Her monthly income is 25,000 Som (KGS).

In order to further develop her business, she has once again turned to Bai Tushum Bank to ask for a loan of 50,000 Som (KGS). This loan will help her to buy calves. Anarkan plans to invest the revenue from the loan in the further development of her business. She dreams of building a house with a shed and a garden for her whole family.

loans.use: to purchase additional calves in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Reina Argentina

texts.es:
Reina, comprarte su vivienda con su esposo, hijos y nietos, al tener necesidad de nuevos ingresos para ser un apoyo económico para su esposo se decidió a tener su propia actividad económica, la cual consiste en vender comida, oficio que aprendió con la ayuda de su familia, tiene 10 años de poseer su negocio, no tiene un horario establecido y las dificultades son cuando la comida no se logra vender por completo.
Solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra de aceite, condimentos, bebidas, sal, granos básicos, huevos, etc., tendrá materia prima para mantener su negocio funcionando por una larga temporada, considera que  la inversión será de ayuda para brindar un servicio de calidad a sus clientes y generar nuevas ganancias.
Para reina es importante lograr darle a su familia un mejor estilo de vida y nuevas oportunidades de superación.
texts.en:
Reina shares her home with her husband, children and grandchildren. In need of more income to support her husband, Reina decided to start her own business selling meals, a trade that she learned with the help of her family. Reina has had her business for 10 years. She does not have a fixed timetable. One difficulty at her business is that sometimes not all of her food gets sold.

Reina is applying for a loan in order to buy oil, condiments, drinks, salt, basic grains, eggs and more to have the basic supplies to keep her business going for a while. Reina believes that this investment will be a great help for Reina to give quality service to her customers and so that she can earn a higher profit.

For Reina, it is important that she be able to offer her family a better quality of life and new opportunities to do better in life.

loans.use: to buy oil, condiments, drinks, salt, basic grains, eggs and more to have the basic supplies to keep her business going for a while.

loans.name: Yorlin Isela

texts.es:
La Joven Yorlin de 23 años de edad, es casada tiene casa propia  y ella radica en la comunidad de El Guayabo # 1 Se dedica desde hace 06 años a su pulpería sus clientes son todos los amigos y vecinos.
Yorlin  es una mujer  trabajadora con muchos deseos de salir adelante a pesar de su corta edad ella cree que con esfuerzo y trabajo puede salir adelante y vivir dignamente su vida con su familia ella agradece a  PRISMA y Kiva, por la oportunidad que le está brindando al aprobar su credito.  
Yorlin esta solicitando el préstamo para compra ABARROTERIA como frijoles, leche, pan, café, arroz, azúcar, manteca, pastas, jabon, mantequilla y otros productos para la venta. Con el apoyo del crédito ella pretende surtir y mejorar su negocio y vivienda
Yorlin solicita 10,000 lempiras para abastecer de productos su pulpería, y con el apoyo de este préstamo espera invertirlo y mejorar más sus ingresos.
Yorlin su sueño es que en su próximo crédito pueda mejorar mas su negocio y vivienda para poder ayudar más a su familia.
San Lorenzo, Valle – Marzo del 2015.
texts.en:
Yorlin is 23 years old, married and owns her house. She lives in the El Guayabo #1. For six years, Yorlin has been working at her grocery store. Her customers are all friends and neighbours.

Yorlin is hard-working and really wants to get ahead. In spite of her young age, she believes that with hard-work she can move forward and live a decent life with her family. Yorlin is grateful to PRISMA Honduras and to Kiva for approving this loan application.

Yorlin is applying for a loan in order to buy groceries, such as beans, milk, bread, coffee, rice, sugar, butter, pasta, soap, lard and other products to sell. With the support of this loan, Yorlin plans to stock up and improve her business and home.

Yorlin is applying for a loan of 10,000 Lempira in order to stock up her grocery shop. She hopes to invest the loan and increase her income.

Yorlin’s dream is that this loan will allow her to improve her business and home so that she can help her family more.

San Lorenzo, Valle. March 2015.

loans.use: to buy beans, milk, bread, coffee, rice, sugar, butter, pasta, soap, lard and other products to sell.

loans.name: Pedro Lorenzo

texts.es: Pedro tiene 59 años de vida y habita junto a su grupo familiar en vivienda propia desde hace 30 años. Él un hombre muy trabajador que se dedica a la venta de productos básicos en su vivienda, además cuenta con un molino de nixtamal con lo que obtiene mejores ingresos, también tiene un gusto por la fotografía, por lo que cuando lo buscan realiza fotografías de eventos como bodas, quinceaños, bautizos, etc. Pedro desea reparar la galera de su vivienda, ya que esta se encuentra deteriorada, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para poder construir el techo de la galera, pero además desea encementar el piso de la misma, por lo que invertirá en: cemento, arena, grava, lámina y pines.
texts.en:
Pedro is 59 years old and lives with his family in a house that they own. They have lived at this house for 30 years. Pedro is very hard-working. He makes a living selling groceries from his home. He also has a corn grinder to help him earn higher earnings. In addition, Pedro enjoys photography and, so, when requested, he takes photos at events such as weddings, important birthday parties, christenings and more. 

Pedro wants to repair the roof of his galley, which is currently in bad condition. He is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to repair the roof and also to cement the floor in his home. He will therefore use this loan to buy cement, sand, gravel, metal sheeting and wood.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, metal sheeting and wood to cement the floor and repair the roof of the galley.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron bars to install a lavatory in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Элмире 21 год. Она замужняя девушка, но пока детей не имеет. Элмира живет вместе с мужем, сестрой мужа и его родителями. Элмира занимается шитьем одежды. Она научилась шить еще в родительском доме и после замужества продолжила шить. Элмира обратилась за кредитом, для купли тканей и швейных принадлежностей (нитки, иголки...). Для совершения такой покупки у Элмиры не хватает денег, и она надеется обратиться за кредитом.
texts.en: Elmira is 21 years old.  She is a young married woman, but she doesn't have any children yet.  She lives with her husband, her husband's sister and his parents.  She sews clothes.  She learned how to sew when she was still living with her own parents, and she kept on sewing after she got married.  She is taking a loan to buy fabrics and sewing supplies (threads, needles...).  Elmira doesn't have enough money for that type of purchase, which is the reason why she is relying on this loan.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and sewing supplies.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
Gregorio es un hombre de 49 años de edad,  casado, tiene 4 hijos de 16, 14, 10 y 8 años, y se dedica a la pesca. 
Él es una persona emprendedora, amable, gentil, honesto, paciente, buena persona, positivo y muy trabajador. Su trabajo lo realiza en la comunidad ‘Isla Suriqui’ del lago Titicaca, a una altura de 3.810 metros sobre el nivel del mar. A solo 90 minutos desde la ciudad capital, este sitio es uno de los centros de acogida turística más destacados de la zona, porque cuenta con la mejor infraestructura hotelera y de comunicaciones. Desde esta isla se organizan los circuitos turísticos por los sectores del entorno del Lago Titicaca y sus islas. 
Gregorio es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el trabajo que realiza. su vida la comparte con su esposa que se dedica al mismo trabajo y con sus hijos, todos estudian en la escuela y se dedican a la pesca. Viven en una casa propia, construida de adobe con techo de calamina y cuenta con energía eléctrica. Su labor es la pesca; cada día acompañado de un hijo él se dirige a su bote, cargado de redes, a realizar su rutina diaria, primero trata de encontrar un lugar ideal para la pesca, enciende su motor y se centra en las aguas poco profundas. “mi negocio es familiar, toda la familia se encarga de la pesca y de la venta…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que toda la familia trabaja en el mismo, la desventaja es el clima frío del lugar. Su sueño es tener más botes de pesca, él desea realizar la compra de redes de pesca para mejorar sus ingresos, su negocio y la calidad de vida de su familia. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 15 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Gregorio solicita un préstamo para la compra de redes de pesca para mejorar sus ingresos y comprar otro bote de pesca.
texts.en:
Gregorio is 49 year-old man who is married and has 4 children aged 16, 14, 10 and 8 years old. He is a fisherman.  

He is a good person who is enterprising, friendly, kind, honest, patient, positive and very hardworking. He works in the ‘Isla Suriqui’ community of Lake Titicaca which is located 3,810 metres [9,843 feet] above sea level. This place, which is only 90 minutes from the capital city, is one of the most outstanding tourist centres in the area because it has the best hotel and communications infrastructure. It is from this city that tours are organized of the areas surrounding Lake Titicaca and its islands. 

Gregorio is deeply tanned, has brown eyes and short black. He is short and thin. His mother tongue is Aymara which is spoken in the area and he speaks Spanish through general knowledge and for work. He lives with his wife who works in fishing and with his children who are all at school but also work as fishermen. The family live in their own house made of adobe with a corrugated metal roof. They also have electricity. He is a fisherman and everyday he goes out in his boat carrying fishing nets and accompanied by one of his sons who drives the boat. His daily routine is as follows: Firstly he tries to find an ideal location to fish. He starts the boat’s engine and positions the boat in shallow water. He describes how his business is a "family business" as "all the family are involved in fishing and selling the fish...” The advantage of his business is that the whole family does the same thing. The disadvantage is that the local climate is cold. His dream is to have more fishing boats. He wants to buy fishing nets to improve his income, his business and his family's quality of life. 

This his first sequence of loans with the institution in 15 years of fishing. 

Gregorio is asking for a loan to buy fishing nets to improve his income and to buy another fishing boat.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets to improve his income and to buy another fishing boat.

loans.name: Safarbi

texts.en: Safarbi is 61 years old.  She is a resident of the city of Kulob.  She is married and she has one son.  Her husband works as a physician at the city's hospital.  Her son is a student at the State University.  Safarbi is a serious and hardworking woman.  She is a professional seamstress and she sews clothes from home.  She has been involved in this activity for the past 15 years.  She loves her work.  She's been thinking of repairing her home for a long time already but since she doesn't have the financial means to do so, she has decided to take a loan.  She is planning to use her loan to buy some corrugated sheet metal and other building materials.

loans.use: to buy corrugated sheet metal and other building materials to repair her house.

loans.name: Aida

texts.ru: Аида, 39 лет, замужем, есть 2 детей. Образование у Аиды среднее, на протяжении 20 лет она занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав с покупки скота на 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Аиды, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: корова, 25 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Аида обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы и 10 овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Аида планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Aida is 39 years old, married, with two children.  She has a secondary education and has been involved in animal husbandry and agriculture for 20 years, having bought her first livestock for 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her very hard work, she currently has one cow and 25 sheep on her farm.  She makes a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her farming business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy one cow and 10 sheep and therefore increase her livestock headcount.  Aida is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further increase her number of domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy one cow and 10 sheep in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Santos Eleuteria

texts.es:
Santos, desde hace 25 años se dedica a desarrollar actividades agrícolas como: cultivo de granos básicos, crianza de cerdos y ganado, también por temporadas procesa caña para producir dulce de panela y comercializarlo, vive con dos hijos que tienen 14 y 10 años de edad, ellos le colaboran con las diferentes actividades de su hogar.
Necesita un financiamiento para comprar concentrado para el ganado y los cerdos, otra parte le servirá para pagar los costos de la recolección de la cosecha, contará con el capital necesario para fortalecer su negocio de manera inmediata, aspira mejorar su situación económica y resarcir su deuda.
Santos anhela reconstruir su vivienda, mejorar la ganaría y la porqueriza.
texts.en:
Santos has been working in agriculture for twenty-five years. She grows grains, raises pigs and cattle, and during some seasons she also grows sugar cane and produces panela [unrefined sugar] to sell. She lives with two children who are 14 and 10 years old and help her with the household chores.

Santos is requesting a loan to buy animal feed. She will also cover the harvesting costs and will have what she needs to strengthen her business. She hopes that her financial situation improves and that she can pay back the loan.

Santos would like to rebuild her house, and improve the pens where she keeps her animals.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and cover the harvesting costs.

loans.name: Liliana Alexandra

texts.es: Liliana una joven de 20 años con ganas de progresar, se encuentra estudiando la carrera de educación de inglés-francés en la universidad “Enrique Guzmán y Valle” lo cual le va bien. Agradece a sus padres por el apoyo y la confianza brindada. Su mayor deseo es  de poder estudiar otra carrera más. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para el pago de su pensión y matricula.  Agradece a los inversionistas kiva que hicieron posible este crédito.
texts.en:
Liliana, 20, is a young woman who wants to get ahead. She is studying to become an English and French teacher at the Enrique Guzmán y Valle University. She is doing well. Liliana wants to thank her parents for the support she has received and the confidence they have in her. Her biggest dream is to be able to study more.

Liliana requested a loan to pay the university fees. She thanks Kiva lenders for making this loan possible.

loans.use: to pay the university fees.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es:
Amelia tiene 45 años de edad, es separada y tiene 2 menores hijos, vive en una casa alquilada en el distrito de Cayalti que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, en una zona de comerciantes. Amelia es una persona de buenas referencias personales y laborales y proviene de una familia de comerciantes que le han enseñado todo en ese rubro.

Amelia se dedica a la crianza y venta de cuyes y patos, este negocio lo lleva desde hace 10 años y le ha traído buenos resultados que han valido su esfuerzo. Esta actividad la ha desarrollado en la casa donde vive y en la casa de sus padres, quienes le han sabido brindar su apoyo incondicional. Amelia desea extender su negocio pues el bienestar de sus hijos lo requiere. Ella solicita un préstamo que invertirá en la compra de una mayor cantidad de patos y cerdos que le permitirán generar nuevas ganancias. Otra parte del crédito será utilizada en la ampliación del corral donde cría a sus animales para que estos crezcan en condiciones óptimas. Con esto Amelia espera mejorar su negocio lo que le generará mayores ingresos y le permitirán tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Amelia, 45, is separated and has two underage children. They live in a rented house in the Cayalti district, which is located in the Chiclayo province, a region with many businesspeople. Amelia has good personal and professional references, and comes from a family of businesspeople, who have taught her everything about this profession.

Amelia raises and sells guinea pigs and ducks. She has been doing this for ten years, and her great efforts have paid off. She works at home and at her parents’, who have given her their unconditional support. Amelia wants to expand her business, thinking of her children’s well-being.

Amelia is requesting a loan to buy ducks and pigs, in order to make better profits. She will also enlarge the pen where she keeps her animals, so that they grow under optimal conditions. Amelia hopes that this will improve her business, which will result in a better income and better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy ducks and pigs.

loans.name: Ranulfo

texts.es:
Ranulfo, trabaja en su carpintería de seis de la mañana a cuatro y media de la tarde, cuenta con una experiencia de 30 años, es así como lleva el sustento diario a su hogar, vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos, la familia trabaja junta y no representan dificultades en este momento en el negocio.
Invertirá en una madera, barniz, clavos, pegamento, taladro, etc., conservara su negocio equipado para elaborar muebles de pedidos especiales y para vender, busca incrementar sus ingresos y tener satisfechos a su clientes.
Los sueños que don Ranulfo tiene son expandir su negocio y ahorrar para que sus hijos puedan estudiar en la universidad.
texts.en:
Ranulfo works in his carpenter's workshop from six in the morning until half past four in the afternoon. He has more than 30 years' experience, which is how he provides for his family. He lives with his wife and four children; the family works together and this has not posed any problems in the business so far. He will buy wood, varnish, nails, glue, a drill, etc... This will keep his workshop equipped to build new furniture on request and to sell. He is looking to increase his income and have satisfied customers.
Don Ranulfo's dreams are to expand his business and save money so that his children might study at university.

loans.use: invest in wood, varnish, nails, glue, a drill, etc... It will keep his business equipped to build new furniture on request and to sell.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Hello, lenders. Meet Rose, a very industrious, honest and hardworking woman from the Nyamira area of Kenya, near the famous lake Victoria. Rose, 21, has been farming for the past 10 years. 

Over the years, she has gathered much experience and is considered among the best farmers in her village. She has been practicing mixed farming. Her primary sources of income have been bananas, milk, eggs, maize, crops and some small business ventures that help her make ends meet. 

Rose is very passionate about farming and loves cultivating her farm. That is why every day, she wakes up very early to go to her farm to plough. Although she makes profits from farming, she is not comfortable, and has always wanted to increase her income by selling cereals. That is why she is seeking this loan to buy cereals. 

Kenya's Nyamira area, one of the country's populated regions, has a high demand for cereals. This means that Rose could increase her profits and satisfy the demand that is there. Accessing funds has been a challenge for Rose, but she now feels relieved because Juhudi Kilimo is partnering with Kiva lenders to help aspiring women farmers like her turn their farming dreams into reality through training and loan financing. 

Rose believes that this loan will be of much help, and that she will be able to satisfy the demand for cereals. She also believes that the extra income she earns will enable permanent change in her life and increase her business. Increased profits will allow Rose to repay this loan and secure the future of her school age children.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Paz Y Bien Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Paz  y Bien” conformada por 07 socios responsables y unidos. Este es el caso de Guadalupe ella tiene 59 años de edad, y tiene 04 hijos. Guadalupe ha llegado a cumplir con algunos de sus sueños como apoyar a sus hijos con sus estudios y mantener su negocio. Actualmente cuenta con una tienda de abarrotes en su vivienda. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de azúcar, arroz y aceite. Seguir trabajando positivamente y que crezca su negocio es su mayor anhelo. El grupo “Paz y Bien”  está agradecido con los inversionistas Kiva y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien. Guadalupe es la primera del lado izquierdo y viste polo color celeste con rayas marrones y amarillas.
texts.en: This is the "Paz y Bien" group made up 7 responsible and close members. This is Guadalupe's situation. She is 59 years old and has 4 children. She has managed to achieve some of her dreams such as support her children with their education and keep up her business. Currently she has a grocery store in her home. It is for this that she asked for the loan to purchase sugar, rice and oil. To continue working positively and that her business grows is her greatest desire. The "Paz y Bien" group is grateful to the Kiva investors and promises to continue working well. Guadalupe is the first on the left and is wearing a light blue shirt with brown and yellow stripes.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice and oil.

loans.name: Alexi Monserrate

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo De Crédito Virgen De Monserrate Del Pollo.
En este lugar vive la señora Alexis, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 3 hijos de 20, 17 y 6 años de edad, estudian en universidad, colegio y escuela. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Alexi es una gran madre y esposa que le gusta ganarse lo suyo y así contribuir con los gastos más que todo de los estudios universitarios de su hijo mayor, ella tiene una pequeña granja donde cría pollos y  gallinas criollas, gracias a esto ella puede tener una actividad que le da lo necesario para sacar adelante a su familia, por eso agradece a la fundación Espoir y a Kiva ya que por ellos ella obtiene sus créditos que le sirven de mucho para mejorar su calidad de vida y lo más importante la educación de sus hijos.
Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que gracias a las ganancias que tuvo ella pudo solventar gastos de la universidad que estudia su hijo mayor. Este crédito es para comprar alimento y medicinas  para los animales y para pagar la matrícula en la universidad de su hijo. Lleva más de 3 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son muy necesarios para ella. Sus sueños son que sus hijos sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, known for many years as the city of the royal tamarinds, the members of the communal bank group Virgen de Monserrate del Pollo meet every two weeks. 

Alexis lives in this place. She is 42 years old, is married, and from this relationship has 3 children, ages 20, 17, and 6. They are students at university, secondary school, and primary school. Her husband is a driver. 

Alexi is a great mother and wife who likes to earn her own income and in this way contribute to the expenses, especially the university schooling of her oldest son. She has a small farm where she raises chickens and creole hens. Thanks to this, she can have work that gives her what she needs to get her family ahead. For this, she is grateful to Fundación Espoir and Kiva since through them she gets her loans which really serve to improve her quality of life and, most importantly, the education of her children.

She is getting another loan since thanks to the earnings that she got, she could pay the university expenses where her oldest son goes to school. This loan is to purchase feed and medicine for the animals and to pay her son's university fees. She has been in the communal bank group for more than 3 years and she likes it because the loans are very necessary for her. Her dream is that her children become good professionals.

loans.use: to purchase feed and medicine for the animals and pay her son's university fees.

loans.name: Julia Maya

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo De Crédito Virgen De Monserrate Del Pollo.
En este lugar vive la señora Julia, tiene 45 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen 2 hijos de 22 y 12 años los mismos que estudian en universidad y colegio. Su marido es comerciante.  
Doña Julia junto al esposo tienen una tienda de víveres en su casa, allí ellos venden víveres de toda clase como  arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, carnes, ciertas cosas de bazar,  agua en bidón, sodas, golosinas, entre otras, ella cada vez que recibe un crédito lo invierte en mayor variedad de productos lo cual le ha servido para aumentar su clientela, ella también vende productos Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos,  perfumería y accesorios de damas), tiene en su tienda unas vitrinas en las cuales vende estos productos y ciertos días sale a ofrecer puerta a puerta, con esto ella se gana algo extra que les sirven para así ir mejorando su calidad de vida. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda va a comprar víveres, frutas, legumbres  y todo lo que ellos venden en su local. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos ella aumenta su negocio. Sus sueños seguir mejorando y tener un mejor local.
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, known for many years as the city of the royal tamarinds, the members of the communal bank group Virgen de Monserrate del Pollo meet every two weeks. 

Julia lives in this place. She is 45 years old, in a common-law marriage, and from this relationship has 2 children, ages 22 and 12, who are students at the university and in secondary school. Her husband is a businessman. 

Julia, along with her husband, has a grocery store in her house. There, they sell all sorts of groceries such as rice, sugar, oil, detergent, vegetables, meat, some small trinkets, bottled water, sodas, sweets, and more. Every time that she gets a loan, she invests in in a wider variety of products which has served to increase her customer base. She also sells Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and ladies' accessories). She has some display cases in her store where she sells these products and on certain days she goes out to sell from door to door. With this, she earns an extra something which helps them to in this way improve their quality of life.   

This loan will be used to stock her store more and she will purchase groceries, fruit, vegetables and all that they sell in their retail space. She has been in the communal bank group since the beginning and she likes it because, thanks to the loans, she expands her business. Her dreams are to continue improving and to have a better store.

loans.use: to purchase groceries, fruits, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Ana Betsabe

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo De Crédito Virgen De Monserrate Del Pollo.
En este lugar vive la señora Ana, tiene 44 años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 12 y 10 años de edad, ambos estudian en colegio y escuela. 
Doña Ana es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder sacar a sus hijos adelante se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y zapatos por catalogo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, ella trabaja tres o cuatro días a la semana y aprovecha las horas de la mañana que sus hijos están estudiando para salir a realizar sus recorridos, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Lleva más de 15 años con este negocio el mismo que le permite ganarse lo suyo y sacar a delante ella sola a sus hijos.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa y zapatos ya que tiene varios pedidos por entregar. Lleva 2 ciclos en  el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus pequeños por lo cual lucha día a día.
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, known for many years as the city of the royal tamarinds, the members of the communal bank group Virgen de Monserrate del Pollo meet every two weeks. 

Ana lives in this place. She is 44 years old, is separated, and from this relationship has two children, ages 12 and 10, both are students, in secondary and primary school. 

Ana is a housewife who, to get her own resources and with that be able to get her children ahead, works selling all sorts of clothing and shoes from a  catalog. Her way of selling is door-to-door. She works three or four days each week and takes advantage of the morning hours when her children are at school to go out and make her rounds. She leaves her products on credit and collects weekly. She has been doing this business for more than 15 years, which allows her to earn her own income and get ahead alone with her children. 

This loan is to purchase clothing and shoes since she has a number of orders to deliver. She has been in the communal bank group for 2 loan cycles and she likes it because the loans are a great help. Her dreams are to give her little ones the best, for which she struggles day by day.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.pt:
A senhora Teresa é viúva, tem 57 anos de idade, mãe de 6 filhos dos 1 está na sua responsabilidade, é negociante a mais de 15 anos, vive em casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de material de construção tal como, chapas, cimento, e bens de consumo como, mala, congelador, estante para dar um bom aspecto a sua casa.
Para o futuro pretende ampliar a sua casa e o seu negocio, para passar a vender a grosso, de modo a melhorar a sua renda .
Sendo viúva ela é o garante do futuro dos filhos, assim sendo tem como desafio poupar fundos no banco para quaisquer eventualidades, e liquidar o empréstimo sem entrar em mora de modo a garantir futuros financiamentos.
texts.en:
Teresa, 57, is a widow. She has six children, one of whom still lives with her, and she has had her own business for more than 15 years. She lives in her own home and does not support anyone else.
She will use the loan to purchase construction materials such as sheet metal and cement, and goods such as a suitcase, a freezer, and a bookshelf to make her house look nice. 
In the future, she plans to expand her house and business; she will start to sell wholesale to increase her income.
As a widow, she is the guarantor of her children's future, so her goal is to save some money in the bank in case of any eventualities, and to pay back the loan promptly to ensure future funding.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sheet metal and cement, and goods such as a suitcase, a freezer, and a bookshelf to make her house look nice.

loans.name: Francisca Adelaida

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo De Crédito Virgen De Monserrate Del Pollo.
En este lugar vive la señora Francisca, tiene 36 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen 4 hijos de 13, 7, 6 y 4 años de edad, uno estudia en colegio, dos en escuela y el menor en jardín de infantes. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.
Doña Francisca es una mujer que hace todo lo posible para que a su familia no les falte lo necesario para vivir, ella se dedica a la cría de animales, tiene un corral en al cual cría chanchos y pollos, gracias a esto ella logra obtener sus ingresos que le sirven para salir adelante, actualmente la mayor parte del crédito es para los cultivos que ellos tienen, en su finca cosechan plátano, maíz, maní, verduras y necesitan del crédito para los trabajos de limpieza y fertilización de los cultivos además de ciertos insecticidas para las plagas y así obtener una muy buena producción. Con los créditos ellos salen adelante por eso agradecen a la institución y  las personas que ayudan para que ellos puedan recibir los créditos ya que es su forma de darles a su familia una vida decente. 
Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que gracias a las ganancias que tuvo ellos pudieron solventar gastos de alimentación y estudios de sus hijos. Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar alimento para los animales, fertilizantes e insecticidas para los cultivos. Lleva 3 años en el Grupo De Crédito y siempre agradecen la llegada de los créditos que les permiten salir adelante. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, known for many years as the city of the royal tamarinds, the members of the communal bank group Virgen de Monserrate del Pollo meet every two weeks. 

Francisca lives in this place. She is 36 years old, in a common-law marriage, and from this relationship has 4 children, ages 13, 7, 6, and 4. One is in secondary school, two in primary school, and the youngest is in a preschool. Her husband works in agriculture. 

Francisca is a woman who does everything possible so that her family doesn't want for what is necessary to live. She works raising animals, she has a corral where she raises pigs and chickens. Thanks to this, she manages to get an income which serves her to get ahead. Currently the larger part of the loan is for the crops that they have. In their farm they grow plantains, corn, peanuts, vegetables and they also need the loan for the work cleaning and fertilizing the crops in addition to certain insecticides for the pests and in this way get a very good harvest. With the loans they get ahead, for this she is grateful to the institution and to the people who help so that she can get the loans since this is her way to give her family a decent life. 

She is getting another loan since, thanks to the earnings that she had, they could pay the costs of food and education for their children. This loan will be used to purchase feed for the animals, fertilizers, and insecticide for the crops. She has been in the communal bank group for 3 years and they are always grateful for the arrival of the loans because they let them get ahead. Her dream is to give her family the best.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed, fertilizer, and insecticide.

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Senhora Maria tem 36 anos de idade, casada e mãe de uma filha menor frequentando pré escola, é negociante e vive em casa própria, sustenta sua mãe.
Com o valor financiado vai reiniciar a actividade de criação de frangos, comprando pintos, rações, e vitaminas.
No futuro pretende abrir uma mercearia, e comprar uma viatura para o transporte pessoal e de mercadorias, visto que nos últimos dias depender de transporte alheio é muito difícil.
O seu maior desafio é de ultrapassar a insuficiência de fundos para aplicar nos seus projectos, fazendo empréstimo na Hluvuku, e poupando no banco.
texts.en:
Maria is 36 years old. She is married and has a young daughter in preschool. She has her own business and lives in her own home. She also supports her mother.
She will use this loan to start up her business raising chickens again; she will buy chicks, feed, and vitamins.
In the future she plans to open a grocery store and buy a car so she can get around and transport goods, since transportation has become quite difficult recently.
Her biggest goals are to overcome her lack of capital for her endeavors, pay back the Hluvuku loan, and start a savings account.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed, and vitamins.

loans.name: Rogerio

texts.pt:
Senhor Rogério tem 35 anos de idade, casado e pai de 2 filhos menores sem idade escolar, é electricista conta própria, vive em casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de cimento areia, varões, para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa. No futuro pretende abrir uma empresa de prestação de serviços de electricidade, como forma de crescer profissionalmente, e dar emprego a outros jovens que precisam.
O seu maior desafio é de liquidar o empréstimo sem entrar em mora de modo a garantir futuros financiamentos e consequentemente concretizar os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Rogério is 35 years old. He is married and has two children who are not yet old enough to go to school. He works as an independent electrician. He lives in his own home with his family and is not financially responsible for anyone else.
He will use the loan requested to buy cement, sand, and other materials to continue the construction on his house. In the future he wants to open a business offering electrician services, both as a way to grow professionally and to employ other young people in need.
His biggest goal is to pay back this loan promptly so he can request more loans in the future to pursue her projects.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and other materials to continue the construction on his house.

loans.name: Edgar Rafael

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo De Crédito Virgen De Monserrate Del Pollo.
En este lugar vive el señor Edgar, tiene 23  años de edad, es soltero y vive en casa de los padres, el estudia medicina en una universidad de la localidad. 
Don Edgar es una joven muy trabajador que para lograr sus ingresos y así poder continuar con sus estudios en medicina desde  hace un año arrendo un local en el centro comercial de la ciudad,  allí él se  dedica a la venta de teléfonos, accesorios, recargas, repuestos y también ofrece asesoramiento técnico en todo tipo de teléfonos celulares. De esta forma el logra ganar sus ingresos y también tener tiempo para seguir con sus estudios esperando forjarse un mejor porvenir.
Este crédito es para comprar teléfonos, repuestos y accesorios telefónicos. Lleva dos ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios y ser un gran profesional.
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, known for many years as the city of the royal tamarinds, the members of the communal bank group Virgen de Monserrate del Pollo meet every two weeks. 

Edgar lives in this place. He is 23 years old, single, and lives in his parents' house. He studies medicine at a university in the area.

Edgar is a very hard-working young man who, to get an income and in this way be able to continue with medical schol, for the past year has rented a space in the mall in his city. There, he works selling phones, accessories, charges, parts, and also offers technical support on all types of cell phones. In this way, he manages to earn his income and also to have time to continue with his studies hoping to forge a better future. 

This loan is to purchase phones and phone parts and accessories. He has been in the communal bank group for two loan cycles and he likes it because the loans are fast. His dreams are to finish his schooling and be a great professional.

loans.use: to purchase phones, and phone parts and accessories.

loans.name: Victor Raul

texts.es:
Victor Raul tiene 28 años de edad, vive con su madre y y padrasto. Vive en casa familiar en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería; ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Victor Raul se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su mototaxi propia en el distrito de Cayaltí y zonas cercanas. Se dedica a este negocio desde hace más de 03 años aproximadamente. El destino del préstamo será para el mantenimiento y arreglo de su mototaxi ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, esto le permitirá asegurar el correcto funcionamiento de su herramienta de trabajo así como también le va permitir dar una buena imagen al prestar servicio a sus clientes, por lo tanto le permitirá generar mayor ingresos, mejores ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Victor Raul is 28 years old and lives with his mother and stepfather. He lives in the family home in a community which works in commerce, agriculture and animal husbandry. It is located in Cayaltí district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Victor Raul works offering transportation service in his own mototaxi in Cayaltí district and nearby areas. He has worked in this business for more than 3 years, approximately. The loan is destined for the maintenance and repairs of his mototaxi since it is in bad condition. This will allow him to assure the proper functioning of his work tool and will also permit him to give a good image to providing the service to his customers, so it will allow him to generate more income, more earnings, with the end of improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to maintain and repair his mototaxi since it currently is in bad condition.

loans.name: Yonny Rene

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo De Crédito Virgen De Monserrate Del Pollo.
En este lugar vive don Yonny, tiene 43 años de edad,  mantiene una relación de unión libre y  fruto de la misma tienen tres  hijos de 14, 13 y 1 año  de edad, los mayores  estudian en colegio, su mujer es ama de casa.
El señor Yonny es un hombre muy trabajador que le gusta a base de esfuerzo sacar adelante a su familia, el tiene una pequeña granja en su casa en la cual cría pollos y chanchos, el compra los pollos y chanchos cuando aun están pequeños y luego los mantiene por espacio de dos a tres meses a los pollos y a los chanchos un poco más de tiempo y luego cuando están listos los entrega a comerciantes, el también tiene cultivos de maní, frejol, pimiento y ají picante, cultivos que tiene en toda época del año y que le dan lo necesario junto a su pequeña granja para darles lo necesario a su familia. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar alimentos para pollos y chanchos y fertilizantes para los cultivos. Este es su segundo ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí, known for many years as the city of the royal tamarinds, the members of the communal bank group Virgen de Monserrate del Pollo meet every two weeks.

Yonny lives in this place. His is 43 years old, in a common-law marriage and from this has three children, ages 14, 13 and 1.  The older ones go to secondary school and his wife is a housewife. 

Yonny is a very hard-working man who likes to get his family ahead with his efforts. He has a small farm at his house where he raises chickens and pigs. He purchases the chickens and hens when they are still small and later he cares for them for a period of two to three months for the chickens, and a bit more time for the pigs, and later when they are ready, he sells them to businesspeople. He also has crops of peanuts, beans, peppers, and chiles, crops that he has all year round and which give him what he needs, along with his small farm, to provide his family with what it needs. 

This loan will be used to purchase feed for chickens and pigs, and fertilizers for his crops. This is his second loan cycle with the communal bank group and he likes it because the loans help him a lot. His dream is to give his children the best.

loans.use: to purchase feed for chickens and pigs, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Los Retamales Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS RETAMALES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Challabamba, provincia de Paucartambo y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Zoraida tiene 28 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la agricultura, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Los Retamales communal bank group. The bank is located in Challabamba district, Paucartambo prvince, and Cusco department.

Zoraida is 28 years old and has 2 children and is partnered. She alternates her daily activities with working in agriculture. She has been in this business a good while, which is going well thanks to the dedication she puts each day into her business. She wants to be able to continue working and in this way to continue supporting her family. 

She asks for the loan to purchase seeds and manure.

The members are grateful for the granted loan and promise to meet the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and manure.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma grows and sells rice. She toils on the land and engages in rice farming as her main source of livelihood. She is a 49-year-old widow with two young dependents. Together with her family, she lives in Talibon, Bohol. To be able to continue her farming business, she decided to take a loan.

She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers and pay for the labor. This will help improve the yield of her farm and provide a higher volume of rice to sell. With the profit, she will be able to provide her children with proper diets. In this way, she could be able to handle her finances and start to expand her current business. 

Gemma hopes that she will be successful in sending all her children to finish their studies for brighter futures.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.name: Auxiliadora

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo hay un lugar conocido como los Arenales, ahí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.
En este lugar vive la señora Auxiliadora, tiene  38 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos, 2 mayores  de edad y tres de 15, 7 y 1 años de edad, los menores  estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
Doña  Auxiliadora con la intención de ganarse algo por su cuenta y con esto ayudarle a su marido con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta productos Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale en sus ratos libres y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos,  deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días. Tiene más de 3 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual ha mejorado con la ayuda de los créditos recibidos, ella también en ciertos días sale a alta mar a ayudarle a su marido con las faenas de pesca, este es un trabajo duro pero a ella le encanta ya que así le ayuda a su marido y pasa tiempo con él.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar cremas, perfumes y materiales para la pesca. Lleva 3 años en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos compra al contado y gana más. Sus sueños es mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
In Crucita parish, in Portoviejo canton, there is a place known as Los Arenales. There, the members of the Fe y Esperanza communal bank group meet every two weeks. This place is known for its lovely beaches, for its cuisine, and for the warmth of its people. 

Auxiliadora lives in this place. She is 38 years old, and is in a common-law marriage from which she has five children, 2 adults and three who are 15, 7 and 1. The younger ones got to secondary and primary school. Her husband works in fishing. 

Auxiliadora, with the intention of earning something on her own and, with this, helping her husband with the household expenses, works selling Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and ladies' accessories). She sells door-to-door. She goes out in her free time and she also sells in her house where her best-known customers come. She leaves it on credit and collects weekly. She has been working in this business for more than 3 years, which has improved with the help of the loans she has gotten. She also, on certain days, goes out to sea to help her husband with the fishing tasks. This is hard work, but she loves it since she can help her husband and spend time with him.

This loan will be used to purchase creams, perfumes, and fishing supplies. She has been in the communal bank group for 3 years and she likes it because with the loans she purchases in cash and earns more. Her dream is to improve her house.

loans.use: to purchase creams, perfumes, and fishing supplies.

loans.name: Alexandrina

texts.en:
A loan of $1,000 is offered to Alexandrina to improve her business.

She is married and she has four children. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, biscuits, body lotion, soft drinks, sagiko and candles. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2002. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Alexandrina independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, biscuits, body lotion, soft drinks, sagiko and candles.

loans.name: Antonina

texts.en:
Antonina is living in a town with her family.

Antonina opened her kiosk in 2009 through her own efforts.  She is generating a good income from selling.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business.

A $600 loan is offered to Antonina to improve her business. She will use the loan to buy fish and rice.

loans.use: To buy fish and rice.

loans.name: Rosa Mercedes

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo hay un lugar conocido como los Arenales, ahí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.
En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene  32 años de edad, está casada pero aun no ha podido tener  hijos. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
Doña Rosa con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto ayudarle a su marido con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, ella sale tres o cuatro días por semana en sus ratos libres y también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, ella aprovecha para venderles a los pescadores cuando llegan hasta las playas ya que  es allí cuando ellos tienen más dinero para comprar. Ella también le da parte del crédito a su esposo para que él lo utilice en sus faenas de pesca, Tiene más de 2 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual se entretiene y se gana algo por su cuenta.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar ropa de todo tipo y materiales para la pesca. Lleva 6 meses en el  Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos. Sus sueños es tener  su casa propia ya que arrienda donde vive.
texts.en:
In Crucita parish, in Portoviejo canton, there is a place known as Los Arenales. There, the members of the Fe y Esperanza communal bank group meet every two weeks. This place is known for its lovely beaches, for its cuisine, and for the warmth of its people. 

Rosa lives in this place. She is 32 years old, is married, but has not been able to have children yet. Her husband works in fishing. 

Rosa, with the intention of earning something herself and, with this, helping her husband with the household expenses, works selling all sorts of clothing. She sells door-to-door. She goes out three or four days each week in her free time and she also sells in her house where her most known customers come. She takes advantage of selling them to the fishermen when they come to the beaches, since it is then when they have the most money to make purchases. She also gives part of the loan to her husband so that he will use it in his fishing tasks. She has been doing this work for more than 2 years, with which she entertains herself and earns something for herself. 

This loan will be used to purchase all sorts of clothing and fishing material. She has been in the communal bank group for 6 months and she likes it because the loans are fast. Her dream is to have her own house since they rent where they live.

loans.use: to purchase all sorts of clothing and fishing materials.

loans.name: Johanna Cecibel

texts.es:
Johanna tiene 20 años de edad es soltera vive con sus padres en Echeandia provincia de Bolivar es integrante de la ventanilla rural Virgen de Guadalupe.
Ella se decica a la compra y venta de ropa solicita el credito para la comprar mercaderia para invertir y asi obtener mas ingresos, las compras realiza en Guayaquil su gran sueño es tener una boutique, en su tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Johanna is 20 years old, single, and lives with her parents in Echeandia, Bolivar province, and is a member of the Virgen de Guadalupe rural service center.

She works buying and selling clothing. She asks for the loan to purchase merchandise to invest and also to get more income. She makes her purchases in Guayaquil. Her greatest dream is to have a boutique. In her free time, she likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Señor De Los Milagros De La Region Group

texts.es:
La Socia Margarita pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE LA REGION, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia continua trabajando para una empresa privada en el área de limpieza, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su trabajo  gracias al desempeño que realiza, siendo  de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de vivieres para su hogar como aceite, leche,arroz entre otros.
Los socios están agradecidos con el crédito otorgado y se comprometen  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde  a la reunión por motivos de trabajo y salud.
texts.en:
Margarita belongs to the Señor de los Milagros de la Region communal bank. This bank is located in Cusco province.

She continues working in a private business in the area of cleaning. She is a responsible and persevering woman. She has been at her work for a good while, thanks to her performance, and in this way she gets her family ahead.

She asks for the loan to purchase groceries for her home such as oil, milk, rice and more.

The members are grateful for the granted loan and promise to make the established payments.

The members who are in the attached photo asked permission to arrive late to the meeting because of work and health.

loans.use: to purchase groceries for her home such as oil, milk, rice and more.

loans.name: Neyda Narcisa

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo hay un lugar conocido como los Arenales, ahí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.
En este lugar vive la señora Neyda, tiene 53 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa. El marido se dedica a la pesca. 
Doña Neyda es una mujer muy trabajadora que hace lo posible para ganar algo y así con sus ingresos mejorar su calidad de vida, ella tiene una pequeña granja en la cual se dedica a la cría pollos y gallinas criollas, pero sus mayores ingresos son por la venta de pescado, ella compra las sardinas que es pez de mucha abundancia en las costas que rodean a este bello lugar, les compra a los pescadores de la zona y luego limpia los peces y curte con limón para entregarlos a comerciantes o a clientes en particular que llegan hasta su casa a comprar este producto que es de mucho agrado de sus clientes. 
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar alimentos y medicinas para animales, así como también  sardinas para la venta. Está en el Grupo De Crédito hace 11 años y le gusta porque así financia su negocio. Sus sueños son tener buena salud.
texts.en:
In the Crucita parish of the Portoviejo canton there is a place known as los Arenales. There, the members of the loan group Fe y Esperanza get together every fifteen days. This place is known for its beautiful beaches, for its gastronomy and for the warmth of its people. 

Here lives Neyda, who is 53 years old and maintains a common-law marriage from which she has four older children. Two of them still live at home. Her husband makes a living fishing. Neyda is a hard-working woman that does everything possible to earn something and improve her quality of life with her income.

She has a small farm where she works raising chickens and native hens, but her biggest income comes from selling fish. She buys sardines which are a very abundant fish on the coasts that surround this beautiful place. She buys them from the fishermen in the area, and later washes the fish and marinates them with lemon to deliver them to shop-keepers or clients, in particular those that come to her house to buy this product which she is very thankful for. 

She will use this new loan to buy food and medicine for the animals, as well as sardines to sell. 

She has been in the loan group for 11 years and she likes it because it is how she finances her business. 

Her dream is to be in good health.

loans.use: to buy sardines, food and medicine for animals.

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVA ESPERANZA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia Flor de Maria  tiene 28 años de edad y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de venta de ropa, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de casacas entre otros.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Las socias que salen adjuntas a la foto pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Nueva Esperanza communal bank group. The bank is located in Cusco province. 

Flor de Maria is 28 years old and is single. She alternates her daily work with her business selling clothing.
