She has been in this business for a good while, which is going well thanks to the dedication that she puts into her business each day. She wants to be able to continue working and in this way continue supporting her family. 

The member asks for the loan to purchase jackets and more. 

The members are grateful for the granted loan and promise to make the established payments. 

The members in the attached photos asked for permission to arrive late to the meeting due to work reasons.

loans.use: to purchase jackets and more.

loans.name: Jessica Jenny

texts.es:
En la parroquia Crucita del cantón Portoviejo hay un lugar conocido como los Arenales, ahí cada quince días se reúnen las socias del Grupo De Crédito Fe y Esperanza, este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente.
En este lugar vive la señora Jessica, tiene  34 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 15, 12 y 6 años de edad, los mayores  estudian en colegio y el menor en escuela. El marido se dedica a la pesca.
Doña Jessica es una mujer que siempre le ha gustado trabajar para tener ingresos que le sirvan para salir adelante, ella tiene una pequeña granja en su casa donde cría pollos, los cría durante dos a tres meses que es el tiempo para que ya estén listos para la venta, después de este tiempo  cuando ya están listos los entrega a  algunas tiendas en la localidad. Ella también y con la ayuda de los créditos que ha recibido hace tiempo atrás empezó a vender ropa de todo tipo y zapatos, ventas que realiza puerta a puerta en momentos que ella esta mas desocupada, de esta forma ella tiene mejores fuentes de ingreso que le permiten mejorar su vida.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar ropa, zapatos y  alimentos para los pollos. Lleva más 5 años  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque así ella mejora su vida. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In Crucita parish, in Portoviejo canton, there is a place known as Los Arenales. There, the members of the Fe y Esperanza communal bank group meet every two weeks. This place is known for its lovely beaches, for its cuisine, and for the warmth of its people. 

Jessica lives in this place. She is 34 years, and is in a common-law marriage from which she has three children, ages 15, 12, and 6. The older ones are in secondary school and the younger one is in primary school. Her husband works in fishing. 

Jessica is a woman who has always liked to work to have income which serve her to get ahead. She has a small farm in her house where she raises chickens. She raises them for two to three months, which is the time to prepare them for sale. After this time, when they are ready, she brings them to some stores in the area. She also, and with the help of the loans that she has gotten in the past, began to sell all sorts of clothing and shoes. She makes the sales from door to door at times when she is the least busy. In this way, she has better sources of income which allow her to improve her life. 

This new loan will be used to purchase clothing, shoes, and chicken feed. She has been in the communal bank group for more than 5 years and she likes it because in this way she improves her life. Her dream is to give her children the best.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes and chicken feed.

loans.name: Señor De Qoyllority De Chinchero Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE QOYLLORITY DE CHINCHERO, él banco esta ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia Romania tiene 52 años de edad tiene 01 hijo y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias al negocio  de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia vende lo que son arroz, azúcar, leche, siendo  de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de gaseosas entre otros.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "Señor de Qoyllority de Chinchero".  The bank is located in the province of Cusco.

Romania is 52 years old, has one child, and is married.  She alternates her daily jobs at a grocery store.  She has a good time with her business, which is going well thanks to the determination that she puts into her work each day.  She sells rice, sugar, and milk.  In this way she gets her family ahead in life.  Romania asks for a loan in order to buy soda, among other items.  

The members are grateful for the loan they have been granted and promise to make their established repayments.

loans.use: to buy soda, among other items.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia Ana Maria pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha Carmen”.
La socia Ana Maria sigue dedicándose a la venta de comida, la socia tiene un restaurante o puesto de venta en uno de los mercados principales de la ciudad de Paucartambo,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como arroz, aceite entre otros.
La socia agradece a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se siente contenta por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: The member Ana Maria belongs to the community bank "Mamacha Carmen." Ana Maria is still working selling food. She has a restaurant or food stand in one of the main markets in the city of Paucartambo. She is a responsible and hard working person. She would like to continue working this way so that she can continue supporting her family. The member needs the loan to buy ingredients such as rice and oil among other items. She thanks the lenders for the loan and she is happy for the support received.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as rice and oil among other items.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia Juana  pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha Carmen”.
La socia continua con su negocio de venta productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez continua con su negocio de venta de carne de pollo, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosas, arroz entre otros.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
The member Juana belongs to the communal bank "Mamacha Carmen."  She continues her business of selling basic need products like rice, sugar, and noodles among other items.  She has had this business for a while, and it is going well thanks to the dedication she puts into her work each day.  At the same time, this member also continues her business of selling chicken. In this way she gets her family ahead in life.

Juana is asking for a loan to buy soda and rice, among other items.  She is grateful for the loan and promises to complete her monthly repayments with great responsibility.

loans.use: to buy soda and rice, among other items.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es:
La socia Emilia pertenece al banco comunal MAMACHA CARMEN, la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de tienda  de abarrotes vendiendo productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos, detergentes, gaseosas ,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosas, aceite, arroz entre otros.
La socia agradece a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se siente contenta por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: The member Emilia belongs to the community bank "Mamacha Carmen." She continues working in her grocery store selling basic needs products, such as rice, sugar, pasta, detergents, soda drinks. The member is a responsible and hardworking person, as it is this way how she supports her family. The member is asking for a loan to buy soda beverages, oil, rice among others. She thanks the lenders for the loan and she is happy for the support received.

loans.use: To purchase soda drinks, oil, rice among other items.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is 38 years old and married with four children, three of whom are in school. Maricel works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of household goods to sell.

Maricel has been in this business for eight years.

In the future Maricel would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of household goods to sell

loans.name: Joanita

texts.en:
Joanita is  taking a loan of $600 to improve her business. She is married, and is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. 

She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her kiosk such as rice and fish.

She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $600.  

She is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy rice and fish

loans.name: Rozinha

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan is offered to Rozinha to improve her business.  She opened her kiosk in 2000 with her own working $100. 

She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store like noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, Coca Cola, Sprite, Sagiko, slippers and body lotion.

She is generating a good income from selling her things from the kiosk.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: To buy noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, water, Coca Cola, Sprite, Sagiko, slippers and body lotion

loans.name: Savath's Group

texts.en:
Savath, 44, is a farmer living in Bovel district of Battambang province. She is a married mother with five children, two of whom are dependent on her. She struggles for a living via growing rice on seven hectares of farmland and sesame on another seven hectares of farmland. To supplement her income, she works as a paid worker. 

This is her second time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she fully repaid her past loan. She leads a group of two to get a new loan. 

She will spend her loan portion to plow the farmland to grow cassava. She hopes that she can earn more income to improve her living standard.

loans.use: to plow the farmland to grow cassava

loans.name: Gertrudis

texts.es:
La socia Gertrudis  pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha Carmen”.
La socia tiene 38 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el  negocio de venta productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosas, arroz entre otros.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: The member Gertrudis belongs to the community bank “Mamacha Carmen”. She is 38 years old, she has two children and is a common law wife. She alternates her daily activities by selling basic needs products such as rice, sugar, pasta among other items. She has had this business for a long time, and she has been able to keep it afloat thanks to the hard work she puts in every day. This is how she supports her family. The member is asking for a loan to buy soda drinks and rice among other items. The member is grateful for the loan and is committed to pay her monthly payments responsibly.

loans.use: To buy soda drinks and rice among others.

loans.name: Leab

texts.en:
Leab is a 44-year-old married woman with three children who lives in Kampong Siem district of Kampong Cham province. 

She grows soybean on one hectare of farmland and raises pigs to supplement her family’s income. She has been involved in her job for 24 years and she can earn about 33,300 KHR per day. This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner. She will use the loan to buy pesticides, fertilizers and plow the farmland to grow soybeans. 

She hopes that she can earn more income to improve her living standard.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and fertilizer.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kampong Siem district

loans.name: Joana

texts.en:
A $ 800.00 loan is requested by Joana to improve her kiosk business opened in 2009. She will use the loan to buy gasoline. She generates a good income.

She  thinks about running a big business and lives in a town with her family.

loans.use: to buy gasoline.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children, one attends school.

She runs a direct-selling personal products business  and requests  29,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more stock items.

She earns additional income through fishing.

Myrna dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock items.

loans.name: Rechelle

texts.en:
Rechelle is a hardworking entrepreneur who has had a business to sell  cultured pearls business for 8 years. 

She is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase cultured pearls to sell.  Rechelle earns additional income from fishing.

She has sustained her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase cultured pearls.

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is a 33-year-old married woman with four children, three attend school, Ailyn works very hard to provide for them.

She has run a general store for 4 years and requests 20,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase  canned goods, eggs, chips, and noodles.

In the future, Ailyn would like to save enough money  to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, eggs, chips, and noodles.

loans.name: Godelio

texts.en:
Godelio engages in the buying and selling of seafood like crabs, shrimp and fish. He is a married man with four dependents. His oldest child is 21, and the youngest is 8. He has been engaged in the buying and selling business for more than 10 years. He lives in Talibon, Bohol. 

He is asking for a loan to purchase more supplies like shrimp, crabs and fish to resell. These will help Godelio sell more seafood to cater to his respective customers. This will improve his sales and enable him to provide his children with nutritious diets. Thus, he could now start to expand his business and continue to support the needs of his growing children.

In the future, he is determined to continue managing his business properly for a sustainable living.

loans.use: to purchase more supplies like shrimp, crabs and fish to resell

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es:
Leticia es de la ciudad de San Ignacio, es soltera e hija única, sus padres siempre han hecho todo para que ella pueda estudiar y ser alguien en la vida.
Está estudiando la carrera de medicina, y comenta que su deseo es poder ayudar a sus padres, y a todas aquellas personas que necesite atención en su salud.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, ya que son costosas y quiere poder cubrir con ese costo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en: Leticia is in the city of San Ignacio. She is single and an only child. Her parents have always done everything so that she could study and be someone in life. She is studying for a career in medicine, and says that her wish is to be able to help her parents, and everyone who needs health care. She requests this loan to be able to pay the fees of her career, as they are expensive and she wants to be able to cover that cost. She is grateful for the opportunity to be able to continue her studies.

loans.use: pay university fees

loans.name: Cherel

texts.en:
As a parent of one child, Cherel works hard to support her family.

She has a buying and selling of spices business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Cherel is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock of spices to sell for her business.

Cherel has been sustaining her business activities through her past 27 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of spices to sell

loans.name: Diane

texts.en:
Diane is 34 years old and married. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

She has a fishing business in the Philippines. Diane requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase a new bundle of fishing supplies.

Diane has been in this business for four years. In the future, Diane would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a new bundle of fishing supplies

loans.name: Honey Grace

texts.en:
Honey Grace is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buying and selling of rice grains business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice grains to sell for her business.

Honey Grace has been in this business for seven years. Honey Grace earns additional income from prepaid mobile load.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice grains to sell

loans.name: Jennie

texts.en:
Jennie is 46 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, soap, milk, sugar, coffee, chips, etc.

Jennie has borrowed and paid 30 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns income from a restaurant.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, soap, milk, sugar, coffee, chips, etc.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes es de la ciudad de Itá, está estudiando y a la vez trabaja para poder solventar un poco los gastos que tiene en la universidad.
Estudia la carrera de enfermería y su meta es poder ser una buena licenciada y especializarse una vez terminada su carrera.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus útiles y sus gastos de manutención, y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Lourdes is from the city of Itá.  She is going to school and working at the same time in order to be able to pay a few of the expenses that she has at the university.

She is studying nursing.  Her goal is to be a good graduate and to specialize once she has finished her degree.

She is requesting this loan to be able to pay for her supplies and her living expenses.  With she will be able to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for her supplies and her living expenses.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia tiene 28 años de edad, vive en armonía junto a su cónyuge y sus 3 menores hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el Caserío San Luis, una comunidad donde sus pobladores son amables y se dedican al cultivo de frutales, café, y hortalizas, ubicado en el Distrito de Santo Tomás, Provincia de Cutervo, Región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, cuyes, cerdos, entre otros. Adicionalmente se dedica al alquiler de cuartos. Cuenta con experiencia en su negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El destino del crédito sera para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto asegurará una buena producción y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lucia, age 28, lives in harmony with her husband and their three children.  They live in their own house made from rustic material in the San Luis hamlet.  The inhabitants of this community are friendly, and they devote themselves to growing fruit, coffee, and vegetables.  It is located in the Santo Tomás district, Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru.

She raises small animals like chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs, among others.  She also rents out rooms.  She has experience in her business, and she has fixed customers who provide her with very good personal and work references.

The loan will be to buy a bigger quantity of animals to increase the stock in her business.  With this she will assure a good production.  As a result, she will get greater earnings in order to be able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a bigger quantity of animals to increase the stock in her business.

loans.name: Daysi Rosana

texts.es:
Daysi tiene 44 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene una hija de 7 años, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún en una zona rural donde los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, golosinas, entre otros, su negocio esta ubicado en su propia casa. Cuenta con 3 años de experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita préstamo para la compra de más mercadería para incrementar el stock de su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para brindarle a sus clientes una variedad de productos y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a permitirle mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Daysi is 44 years old and is a single mother with a seven year old daughter. She lives with her family in the district of Oyotún in a rural area where the population make a living in agriculture and livestock. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the region Lambayeque, on the northern coast of Peru.

She makes a living selling groceries such as rice, sugar, oil, noodles, and candies, among others, and her business is located in her own home. She has 3 years of experience in this business and has regular customers who provide good personal and work references for her. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of more merchandise to increase the stock of her business. This investment will serve to provide customers a variety of products and thus meet the diverse needs of customers in the area. This will generate higher revenues which will permit her to improve the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to increase the stock of her business.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.en:
Guadalupe manages and own a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells various merchandise, including cooking oil, eggs, biscuits, powdered milk, sugar, soap and condiments. 

She is 66 years old and a married woman with seven grown children from Talibon, Bohol. Aside from that, she also engages in selling fresh fish to have supplemental income.

She is asking for a loan to buy canned goods, noodles, soft drinks, condiments and toiletries. This stock will be very helpful in attaining a higher income and the ability to attract more customers. Thus, she could be able to manage her finances and start to expand for possible business opportunities. 

Guadalupe hopes that her sources of income will become more sustainable in the coming years.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, soft drinks, condiments and toiletries

loans.name: Salome

texts.es:
Salome tiene 41 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de su cónyuge y sus 10 hijos menores, vive en casa propia de material rústico en una comunidad pequeña dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Santo Tomás, provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cultiva café de la variedad catimore, se dedica a este negocio hace 14 años, también cultiva caña de azúcar, cuenta con mucha experiencia en el rubro y con buenas referencias en su distrito. El destino del crédito será para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de café, con ello obtendrá buen rendimiento y mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Salome is 41 years old. He has a stable home alongside his spouse and their 10 little children. He lives in his own house made of rustic materials in a little community dedicated to agriculture and livestock. The community is located in the district of Santo Tomas, province of Cutervo, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru. 

Salome makes a living in agriculture, cultivating Cantimore variety coffee. He has been in this business for 14 years. He also cultivates sugarcane. He has much experience in this industry and good references in his district. The end use of the loan will be to buy fertilizer to provide maintenance for the cultivation of coffee. With this he will obtain high yields and better income in order to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to provide maintenance for the cultivation of coffee

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa works hard to support her family. Jesusa is married and has a buying and selling of dried fish business in the Philippines.

Jesusa requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of dried fish to sell.

Jesusa has been in this business for 21 years now, and also earns additional income.

In the future, Jesusa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en:
Ma. Elena  is 59 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school. Ma. Elena works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan through NWTF to buy more stock of items to sell like soap, milk, coffee, spices, etc.

Ma. Elena has been in this business for eight years.

In the future, Ma. Elena would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of items to sell like soap, milk, coffee, spices, etc.

loans.name: Laurinda

texts.en:
Laurinda is taking a loan of $800 to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. 

She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store, such as noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, Fanta, coffee and biscuits. She opened her kiosk a year ago with her own working capital of $400.  

She is a hardworking woman, and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy noodles, cigarettes, sugar, salt, milk, Fanta, coffee and biscuits

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 35 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. Myrna works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell like soap, shampoo, spices, sugar, eggs, etc.

Myrna has been in this business for one year.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like soap, shampoo, spices, sugar, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Nurzhamal

texts.ru: Нуржамал, 47 лет, не замужем, 3 детей. У Нуржамал- незаконченное высшее образование- инженер-технолог общественного питания, по средне-специальному образованию она массажист. До ошских событий 2010 года она занималась торговлей овощей. На сегодняшний день работает массажистом и лечит иглоукалыванием, ее заработная плата- 12,215 сом (KGS) в месяц. Дочь - инженер- спектографолог, старший сын не работат, младший - школьник.  Нуржамал обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 90,000 сом (KGS) на проведение ремонта в доме. Она приобретет пластиковые окна, кафель, кирпичи, трубы. Свои доходы она и дальше планирует вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий и образование сына.
texts.en:
Nurzhamal is 47 years old, not married and has three children. Nurzhamal has unfinished higher education in food science. She has vocational education in massage therapy. 

Prior to the riots in Osh in 2010, Nurzhamal worked with selling vegetables. However, currently she works with massage therapy and acupuncture. Her monthly salary is 12,215 som (KGS) per month. Her daughter is a spectrograph engineer, her eldest son does not work and the youngest one is in school. 

Nurzhamal turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 90,000 som (KGS) to carry out renovation of her house. She will purchase plastic windows, tiles, bricks and pipes. She plans to continue to invest her income on improving their living conditions and on the education of her son.

loans.use: to buy plastic windows, tiles, bricks, pipes etc. in order to make improvements to her house

loans.name: Jurahon

texts.ru: Это Чурахон. Ему 47 лет. Он житель города Куляб. Чурахон женат и имеет детей. У него 2 сына и 4 дочери. Сыновьям 21 и 18 лет. Дочкам 16, 14, 11 и 8 лет. Чурахон честный, трудолюбивый и хорошо воспитанный человек. Он любит трудиться и честно зарабатывать. Чурахон обратился за кредитом, чтобы начать свой бизнес. За счет кредита он планирует купить несколько крупнорогатого скота. Купить скота и откармливает их в течение определенного времени, и перепродавать их на скотном рынке. У него есть коровник и корм для скота. Его единственный вариант получить кредит и начать бизнес. Поддержите Чурахон достичь своих целей.
texts.en: This is Jurahon. He is 47 and lives in the city of Kulob. He is married and has two sons and four daughters. His sons are 18 and 21 and his daughters are 8, 11, 14 and 16. Jurahon is an honest, hardworking, well-mannered man. He loves working and earning an honest living. Jurahon applied for a loan to start his own business. He plans to use the loan to buy some cattle. He will buy the cattle, fatten them for the proper amount of time and then sell them at the livestock market. He has a barn and feed for the cattle. The only thing remaining is to take out a loan and start the business. Support Jurahon in achieving his goals.

loans.use: to buy cattle and start a new business.

loans.name: Zhyldyz

texts.ru: Жылдыз, 52 года, не замужем, есть дочь. У нее высшее образование, работает, также уже много лет Жылдыз занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 3 коровы. На арендованном участке мерою 3,0 Га она выращивает фасоль для внутрихозяйственного потребления. Ежемесячный доход Жылдыз составляет около 16,000 сом (KGS), этих средств катастрофически не хватает на достойную жизнь, поэтому она решила развивать свой бизнес и обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетели и 10 овец. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, она хочет накопить на образование ее дочери.
texts.en:
Zhyldyz is 52 years old, not married and has one daughter. She has higher education and a job. For many years she has additionally worked with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation. Thanks to persistent work, she currently has three cows on her farm. She also grows haricots for own use on a rented plot of land of 3.0 hectares. 

Zhyldyz' monthly income is around 16,000 som (KGS). This money is unfortunately not enough for a decent life, and therefore she decided to expand her business. She turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to purchase a heifer and ten sheep. She plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of livestock. She would also like to save money for her daughter's education.

loans.use: to purchase a heifer and ten sheep in order to increase her income

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Ее зовут Мухаббат. Она молодая мама и жена. Она замужем, но ее муж на данный момент находится за приделами страны на заработках. Мухаббат вместе с сыном живут в одном из населенных пунктов вблизи городка Худжанда. Мухаббат работает в салоне красоты. Она делает прически и маникюр. Мухаббат хочет расширить деятельность и принести в дом больше дохода, с такими намерениями она обратилась за кредитом. Мухаббат на заемные деньги приобретет инструменты и средства по уходу ногтей. С полным рабочим арсеналом Мухаббату будет легче и приятнее работать, это повлияет на результат ее работы и привлечет к себе больше клиенток.
texts.en:
This is Muhabbat. She is a young mother and wife. She is married, but her husband is currently abroad as a migrant worker. Muhabbat and her son live in one of the settlements close to the town of Khujand. 

Muhabbat works at a beauty salon. She fixes hair and nails. Muhabbat would like to expand her business and bring home a larger income. With this intention she applied for a loan. Muhabbat would like to use the loan amount to purchase tools and instruments for doing nail care. With full equipment it will be easier and more pleasant to work. It will also affect the result of the work and attract more customers.

loans.use: to purchase tools and instruments to do nail care

loans.name: Felipa Mercedes

texts.es:
Felipa tiene 21 años de edad, vive en casa propia en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, desde hace más de 02 años, por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de la zona. Adicionalmente genera otros ingresos por alquiler de mototaxi y su cónyuge se desempeña como peón agrícola en diferentes cultivos de su distrito. El destino del préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de estos, con esto Felipa espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que incrementará su nivel de ventas y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Felipa is 21 years old. She lives in her own house in a community that works in commerce, agriculture and raising livestock. It is located in the district of Zaña, in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the North Coast of Peru.

She works raising and selling animals like chickens, ducks and turkeys amongst others. She has been doing this for more than 2 years. So she has experience in the field and good references from the inhabitants of the area. She also generates more income from renting a motorcycle and her husband works as farm labor in the different crops in the district.

The loan will be used to buy a greater quantity of animals as well as balanced feed to fatten them. Doing this Felipa hopes to offer a greater variety of animals to her clients which will increase her level of sales and in the end improve her quality of living and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals as well as feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Nelia works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell rice grain business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice. Nelia is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell for her buy-and-sell rice grain business.

Nelia has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell

loans.name: Janet Cecilia

texts.es:
Janet Cecilia tiene 23 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposo se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general en su tienda ubicada en su domicilio, tiene clientela considerable quienes brindan buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de variedad de productos como sacos de arroz, harina, leche enlatada, huevos, menestras entre otros y de esta manera ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos generando mayores ingresos para su familia lo que va a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Janet Cecilia is 23 years old, lives with her husband and children in the Oyotún district.  People in this community make a living working in farming, commerce and with cattle.  It is s located in the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region in the north coast of Perú. Together with her husband, she sells groceries in her store which is located in her house. She has a good amount of customers who give her good work and personal references.  

She is requesting this loan to buy a variety of products, such as rice bags, flour, canned milk, eggs and vegetable soups among others to offer a greater variety of products to her customers.  This will generate more income for her family and will improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of products such as bags of rice, flour, canned milk, eggs, vegetable soups among others.

loans.name: Segundo Armando

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 30 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa familiar en una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de animales, en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la fabricación de productos metálicos tales como puertas, vitrinas, ventanas, andamios, entre otros, realiza esta actividad desde hace 10 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio. Cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias en su distrito. Solicita préstamo para realizar arreglos y mantenimiento al lugar donde se encuentra ubicado su taller, así como para la compra de herramientas para su negocio, esto le servirá para tener mejores herramientas y darle una mejor apariencia a su taller para poder captar mayor cantidad de clientes lo que le generará más ingresos y por ende va a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Segundo is 30 years old. He has a partner and one child under his care. He lives in a family home in a rural area of the Oyotun district. This community works in agriculture and raising animals. It is located in the Chiclayo province, which belongs to the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru.

He makes a living manufacturing metal products such as doors, cabinets, windows, and scaffolds, among other things. He has been in this business for the past 10 years, and his business is located in his home. He relies on experience in this business and on good references in his district.

He is requesting a loan to perform repairs and maintenance to the place where he has his workshop and to buy tools for his business. This will allow him to have better tools and to give his workshop a better appearance in order to expand his customer base. He hopes to increase his earnings and, ultimately, to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to perform repairs and maintenance to the place where he has his workshop and to buy tools for his business.

loans.name: Fredy Enrique

texts.es:
Fredy tiene 21 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa familiar en el distrito de Oyotún, esta es una comunidad rural donde los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de mecánica en su propio taller, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 02 años, su taller se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio. Cuenta con experiencia en este rubro y con buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. Solicita préstamo para realizar arreglos en la infraestructura de su taller de mecánica así como para la compra de nuevas herramientas; esto le servirá para tener más herramientas y darle una mejor apariencia a su taller para poder captar mayores clientes lo que le permitirá incrementar su nivel de ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Fredy is 21 years old. He is single, and he lives in a family home in the Oyotun district. This is a rural community where the population works in agriculture, commerce, and livestock. It is located in the Chiclayo province, which belongs to the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru. 

He makes a living as a mechanic, providing services in his own workshop. He has been in this business for the past 2 years, and his workshop is located in his home. He relies on experience in this business and on good references from those who live in his district. 

He is requesting a loan to perform repairs to the infrastructure of his mechanics workshop and to buy new tools. This will allow him to have more tools and to give his workshop a better appearance in order to expand his customer base. He hopes to increase his earnings and, ultimately, to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to perform repairs to the infrastructure of his mechanics workshop and to buy new tools.

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell cashew nut business in the Philippines. Sally requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of cashew nuts to sell.

Sally has been in this business for five years now. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of cashew nuts to sell

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines. Ruth has been in this business for eight years. She earns additional income from fishing and seaweed culture. She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through Kiva's partner, Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF), to purchase more ingredients such as vegetables, meat, fish, etc for her restaurant business. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients for her restaurant.

loans.name: Sanoeun

texts.en: A local farmer living in Kampong Cham province, Sanoeun is 49 years old. To support her living condition, she grows cassava and rice as the main source of income. Moreover, she can earn more income by working for others for a fee. For Sanoeun, this is her fourth cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid back her past loans. She will spend her entire loan portion to pay her land fee. She hopes that she can get more yields than last year.

loans.use: To pay her land fee.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Thorn's Group

texts.en: Thorn is 40 years old and a mother of eight children. She grows two hectares of cassava in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia as her main source of income. Moreover, she earns extra income by rice cropping on a half hectare. She has been involved in this business for ages and earns about 43,300 KHR per day. This is her seventh cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), and she has fully repaid her past loans. In a group of two, she is the group leader. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer, pay for laborers, and buy school materials for her children. She hopes that she can get more income to expand her farmland.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, pay for laborers, and buy school materials for her children.

loans.name: Shahally

texts.en:
Shahally is single and works hard to support her family. She operates a food vending business in the Philippines, which she has been doing for one year.

Shahally requested a loan from NWTF for 10,000 PHP, which she will use to buy ingredients for her food production business. In the future, She would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Sokly's Group

texts.en: Sokly, 22, and single, lives in Kampong Cham,  She grows cassava on 1 hectare of land and sells grocery items to earn extra income. For Sokly, this is her sixth loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans. She leads a group of two to get new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer, pesticide, pay for labor and buy more grocery items. She hopes that she can get more income to expand her farmland.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, pesticide, pay for labors and buy more grocery items.

loans.name: Vann's Group

texts.en: Vann’s group lives in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. Vann makes a living cultivating rice to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to purchase a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their families

loans.name: Sitha's Group

texts.en: Sitha’s group lives in a rural village in Pailin province in Cambodia. Sitha makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a farm laborer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help this woman and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients and raw materials to increase her production and prepare fried foods, desserts and lunch meals.

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en: Mom’s group lives in a rural village in Pailin province in Cambodia. Mom works as a farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Samath's Group

texts.en: Samath’s group lives in a rural village in Pailin province in Cambodia. Samath works as farmer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and men safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.
